title: Longsword
content:
Longsword Common 1~10 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8) Slashing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A fine but well-used sword. It seemed to have once belonged to a holy order, but the indication of rank and patron deity at the hilt have recently been filed down. Longsword Versatile 1.35 75

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d10 (1d8) Slashing

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A fine but well-used sword. It seemed to have once belonged to a holy order
